about_the_game:
Tactical victory or agonizing defeat… The choice is yours —

  • Battle your way through the continent of Ianua with your force of heroes in tactical combat encounters that take place on a grid, reminiscent of games such as Fire Emblem, Final Fantasy Tactics and Shining Force. 

  • As Callon, use the powers of a Tactimagus to make every move count. Utilize a myriad of spells, attacks, and abilities across your ever-expanding team to forge your victory across dozens of increasingly complex strategic battles.

  • Battler together with other members of your force to build up your bond, then unlock and employ devastating tach attacks together!

Two countries — one empowered by magic, the other by technology — have been at war for 100 years with no end in sight… but nobody seems to remember how it began. Will you fight to discover the truth? 

Join Callon Roth, Orvus Magnaric, and Vedette Kairn, three childhood friends-turned-soldiers in this 2.5D Strategy RPG adventure as they recruit a varied cast of 15+ warriors, thieves, mages, engineers, and more to plan heists, battle monsters, uncover ancient weapons, foil dark plots, and unlock the mysteries of a continent caught in a century-long struggle with the heart of your favorite stories from the 16 and 32-bit eras.

KEY FEATURES

  • Emotionally-driven cinematic storytelling — A 30-hour story-driven single-player adventure awaits you as you journey across the great continent of Ianua. Join Callon and his friends as they uncover enemies and allies, tackle surprising challenges, and deal with the machinations of powerful figures dead set on reshaping the future in their image, and see how your characters and their relationships grow during their journey.

  • A pixel art 2.5d  world full of fascinating creatures — Lead your characters through a unique pixel art 2.5d world full of races, creatures, and monstrosities as they journey down unexpected paths. You may be surprised where you end up as you forge unforeseen alliances that could either lead you to the end of The Scorian War… or the end of the world.

  • Over 12 recruitable characters — Grow your force by locating and recruiting new members during your journey across the continent and through unique and exciting locations.

  • Customize your force — Promote and customize your characters and their abilities, then choose which ones to include in your force based on your preferred tactical strategies.

Take up your sword and embark on an unforgettable adventure with Callon and the Aegis Force to end the Scorian War and bring peace to the continent!

short_description: Aegis Force is a story-driven tactical JRPG that blends tactical turn-based combat with full world and town exploration. It captures the essence of genre-defining JRPG classics with stunning pixel art 2.5D visuals, a morally complex story, and an intricately detailed world with secrets to uncover.
